bool allFilesExist(IEnumerable<string> files)

Checks if all given files exist

void checkFileExists(string fileName)

Raises an exception if the file doesn't exist on disk.

bool directoryExists(string arg00)

Checks if the directory exists on disk.

DirectoryInfo directoryInfo(string path)

Creates a DirectoryInfo for the given path

string DirectoryName(string fileName)

Gets the directory part of a filename

void ensureDirectory(string dir)

Checks if the given directory exists. If not then this functions creates the directory.

void ensureDirExists(DirectoryInfo dir)

Ensure that directory chain exists. Create necessary directories if necessary.

bool fileExists(string arg00)

Checks if the file exists on disk.

FileInfo fileInfo(string path)

Creates a FileInfo for the given path

FileInfo[] filesInDir(DirectoryInfo dir)

Gets all files in the directory

FileInfo[] filesInDirMatching(string pattern, DirectoryInfo dir)

Finds all the files in the directory matching the search pattern

FileSystemInfo fileSystemInfo(string path)

Creates a FileInfo or a DirectoryInfo for the given path

string FindFirstMatchingFile(string pattern, string dir)

Gets the first file in the directory matching the search pattern or throws if nothing was found

string FullName(string fileName)

Converts a filename to it's full file system name

DirectoryInfo[] subDirectories(DirectoryInfo dir)

Gets all subdirectories

FSharpOption<string> TryFindFirstMatchingFile(string pattern, string dir)

Gets the first file in the directory matching the search pattern or None
